descriptions.clear-number: Number of messages to be cleaned (Optional / Default 5)

messages.help:
• **/about** - Information about Parzibot
• **/clear** `number` - Clear messages in current Text Channel
• **/help** - The list of Parzibot basic commands
• **/members** - Members of current Text Channel
• **/ping** - Parzibot ping

descriptions.dice-value: The value what you're predicting (from 1 to 12)
descriptions.help: The list of Parzibot game commands
descriptions.gg: Advises to play a random game

dice-responses: You won :D. The sum of values is **{v1 + v2}**. The values of dice is **{v1}** and **{v2}**
You guess value one of the dice :D The values of dice is **{v1}** and **{v2}**
You lose :( The values of dice is **{v1}** and **{v2}**
You're predicting wrong value. The value should be between 2 and 12
messages.help:
• **/8ball** `question` - The Ball of Predictions
• **/coin** - The Heads or Tails Game
• **/dice** `value` - The Dice Game
• **/gamehelp** - The list of Parzibot game commands
• **/gg** - Advises to play a random game
• **/whiteblack** `color` - The White/Black Game

descriptions.help: The list of Parzibot music commands
descriptions.pause: Pause current song in Voice Channel
descriptions.resume: Resume current song in Voice Channel
descriptions.playlist: Show number of songs and songs titles in Playlist

messages.help:
**Help Commands**
• **/musichelp** - The list of Parzibot music commands

**Connect commands**
• **/connect** - Parzibot connects to Voice Channel
• **/disconnect** - Parzibot disconnects from Voice Channel

**Playing commands**
• **/play** `url` - Play song in Voice Channel
• **/replay** - Replay song in Voice Channel
• **/pause** - Pause current song in Voice Channel
• **/resume** - Resume current song in Voice Channel
• **/repeat** - Enable/Disable current song repeating
• **/next** - Play next song from Playlist

**Playlist commands**
• **/playlist** - Show number of songs and songs titles in Playlist
• **/playlistadd** `url` - Add song to Playlist
• **/playlistclear** - Clear all songs from Playlist
• **/playlistshuffle** - Enable/Disable Playlist shuffling
connect: You're not connected to any **Voice Channel**
disconnect: You're not connected to any **Voice Channel**

descriptions.help: The list of Parzibot moderator commands
descriptions.announce: Make announce message in current Text Channel
descriptions.role: Create role with default role permissions on Server
descriptions.giverole: Give role to Member on Server
descriptions.giverole-role: Role that will be received by Member
descriptions.nickname: Change nickname to Member on Server
descriptions.nickname-member: Member to whom we will change nickname
descriptions.defaultrole: Set default role what will be giving to new members of Server
descriptions.defaultrole-role: Role what will be set as default
descriptions.defaultroleremove: Remove default role what will be giving to new members of Server

messages.help:
**Help Commands**
• **/modhelp** - The list of Parzibot moderator commands

**Announce Commands**
• **/announce** `message` - Make announce message in current Text Channel

**Member Control Commands**
• **/ban** `member` - Ban member on your Server
• **/kick** `member` - Kick member on your Server
• **/nickname** `member` `nickname` - Change nickname to Member on Server

**Role Commands**
• **/role** `name` `color` - Create role with default role permissions on Server
• **/giverole** `member` `role` - Give role to Member on Server
• **/defaultrole** `role` - Set default role what will be giving to new members of Server
• **/defaultroleremove** - Remove default role what will be giving to new members of Server
role: Role hasn't set (**Default Role** should be set for using this command)
defaultroleremove: **Default Role** has not been installed (Default Role should be set for using this command)

messages.greeting-message: White **/help** to find out basic command, **/gamehelp** to find out game commands or **/musichelp** to find out music command

messages.error-mod: You doesn't have permissions for executing this command
